DOC.criteria: healthy singleton pregnancy Cesarean section 37 + 0 41 + 6 gestational week clinically significant congenital malformation birth weight < 2000 gram intubation 200 bp 5 min relevant medication mother , e.g . albetol , betaagonists ( e.g . salbutamol , salmeterol ) , corticosteroids suspicion of/confirmed pneumothorax infection
